metadata.Title: STEMP - Soil temperature by layer
metadata.Institution: The University of Georgia; University of Florida; Iowa State University; International Center for Soil Fertility and Agricultural Development; University of Guelph
metadata.Extended description: Daily soil temperature component that computes the temperature profile by soil layer and a surface litter temperature using an EPIC/Parton-Logan damping-depth approach. It uses climate normals (TAV, TAMP), daily weather (TAVG, TMAX, SRAD), latitude, soil albedo (MSALB), bulk density, layer depths, and soil water status to update ST(L) and SRFTEMP, maintaining a 5-day moving mean.
